entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
